resources.string:
MoviesApp is a comprehensive and in-depth resource for finding out more about the movies, actors and filmmakers you love.
On MovieApp you'll find:
Reviews of upcoming and classic films
In-depth Information about your favorite movies, actors and filmmakers
New movies in theaters - Browse the movies playing at your local theaters and buy tickets for upcoming showings
Now Available to Watch - Movies that are available to rent, stream or own on multiple streaming services
Recommendations - An entire section devoted to personalized movie recommendations for you
Explore movies by genre, mood or theme
